text:
function MakeUnitFrame(unit)
	local rc = CreateFrame("Frame", "MyUnitFrame_"..unit, UIParent, "SecureUnitButtonTemplate")


	rc:SetAttribute("unit", unit)
	RegisterUnitWatch(rc)

	rc:RegisterForClicks("AnyUp")
	rc:SetAttribute("alt-type1", "target")

	rc:SetPoint("CENTER", UIParent, "CENTER", 0, 0)
	rc:SetWidth(256)
	rc:SetHeight(256)

	rc.background = rc:CreateTexture(nil, "BACKGROUND")
	rc.background:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", rc, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
	rc.background:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", rc, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
	rc.background:SetWidth(rc:GetWidth())
	rc.background:SetTexture(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
end
